turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like for you to order me food for lunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to eat today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We have decided we wanted to get some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We want you to place the order with Anthony's Coal Fired Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order from there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We want to start with some salads. Order an arugula salad with burrata and a classic Italian salad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else would you like to go with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We want two pizzas to go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sizes would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We want to get two larges. One will be a Fresh Mozzarella Sliced Tomato & Basil Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What about other one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the next one we want a Paulie's Pie with hot peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thats it for this order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What address will it be delivered at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have it delivered to the office in Ft lauderdale.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How ill you be paying for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use my Chase debit card with the last four of 4587.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for everything came up to $50. You should have your order within 45 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Thats it for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

items.name: Fresh Mozzarella Sliced Tomato & Basil Pizza
